entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
